english.segment1: blessed be Your name. in the land that is plentiful. where your streams of abundance flow. blessed be Your name
english.segment2: and blessed be Your name. when I'm found in the desert place. though I walk through the wilderness. blessed be Your name
english.segment3: Pre-Chorus: every blessing You pour out. I'll turn back to praise. when the darkness closes in, Lord. still I will say
english.segment4: Chorus: blessed be the name of the Lord. blessed be Your name. blessed be the name of the Lord. blessed be Your glorious name
english.segment5: and blessed be Your name. when the sun's shining down on me. when the world's 'all as it should be'. blessed be Your name
english.segment6: and blessed be Your name. on the road marked with suffering. though there's pain in the offering. blessed be Your name
english.segment9: Bridge: You give and take away. You give and take away. my heart will choose to say. Lord blessed be Your name
english.segment10: I will bless Your name, Lord
english.segment12: - Pre-Chorus (Rebecca only) -. - Chorus (2x) -. oh, You give and take away. You give and take away. but my heart will choose to say (oh Lord!). blessed be Your name. You give and take away. You give and take away. but my heart will choose to say (oh Lord!). blessed be Your name
english.segment13: (bless.. bless Your name. bless Your name. bless..)
